goal.en: 1. Understanding of my country‘s practical commercial laws and amendments. 2. Combining the application of finance and law will help future business operations and industrial development capabilities.
goal.ch: 一、認識我國實務之商事法規及修法趨勢。 二、結合財經與法律的運用，有助於未來企業經營及產業發展能力。

content.en:
1. Commercial law includes company law, maritime law, insurance law, and bill law. The course uses the aforementioned four laws as the main discussion content, through the discussion of specific cases, so that students have a basic understanding of regulating commercial laws.
2. The Company Law was passed the third reading on July 6, 2018. The main amendments include fund-raising for new ventures, retention of outstanding corporate talents, improvement of the operating mechanism of the board of directors and shareholder meetings, and diversified earnings distribution. Through the introduction of the amendments, the spirit, intention and key references of the amendments to the company law will be introduced.
content.ch:
一、商事法包含公司法、海商法、保險法、及票據法等法律。課程以前述四項法律為主要討論內容，透過具體案例及時事討論，讓同學對規範商事法律，有基礎瞭解及運用各組分組報告，完成運用商事法之案例。
二、公司法107年7月6日三讀通過。主要修正內容包括有利新創事業的籌資、企業優秀人才留任、健全董事會股東會運作機制、多元化盈餘分派等企業經營變革，透過介紹修法，了解公司法修法精神、意旨及重點參考。

textbook.ch: 一、王文宇等著，商事法，元照出版公司，8版。 二、吳博文，商事法，三民書局，1版。 二、潘維大等著，商事法，三民書局，13版。
